name: trebor-router
description: The Official router library for TreborJS

scripts.build:comp: trebor -i route-link.html -o ./build -f es && trebor -i router-view.html -o ./build -f es
scripts.build:test: npm run build:comp && npm run build:prod && rollup -c rollup.config.js --environment BUILD:test

author: InDIOS
